title: Review Assignment
description: An assignment to the reviewer to review a submission.

_href.description: A URL to this object in the REST API.

cancelled.description: Indicates whether review assignment was cancelled

considered.description: Whether editor considered a review assignment request

dateAcknowledged.description: Date editor was familiarized with the review

dateAssigned.description: Date the reviewer was assigned to the submission

dateCancelled.description: Date the reviewer cancelled the assignment

dateConfirmed.description: Date the reviewer confirmed the assignment to the submission

dateDue.description: Date the review assignment should be completed

dateNotified.description: Date the reviewer was notified about the assignment

dateRated.description: Date the submission was rated by the reviewer

dateReminded.description: Date the reviewer was reminded about the assignment

dateResponseDue.description: Date until which the response from reviewer is expected

declined.description: Whether review assignment was declined by tge reviewer

id.description: The id of this review assignment

lastModified.description: Date of the most recent assignment update

requestResent.description: Whether the review request was resent to the reviewer

reminderWasAutomatic.description: Whether the reminder for the reviewer about the assignment was send automatically

reviewerFullName.description: The full name of the reviewer

reviewFormId.description: The ID of the custom review form

reviewMethod.description: The method used in the review. One of the SUBMISSION_REVIEW_METHOD_ constants

reviewRoundId.description: The ID of the review round

round.description: The round of the review stage

stageId.description: The ID of the review stage: external or internal review

status.description: The status of the review assignment. One of the REVIEW_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS_ constants

step.description: The current step of the reviewer form

submissionId.description: The ID of the submission associated with the assignment

submissionLocale.description: The locale of the submission associated with the assignment

publicationTitle.description: The title of the associated with the current publication
